pull.title: wallet: fund transaction external input cleanups

events.body:
~Perhaps you could also include a fix to the intermittent test failure?~ I'll open a PR

Also please squash, they're all trivial 2 line commits.

events.message:
External input fund support cleanups

Synchronize error checking for external inputs
Rename external output Select to SelectExternal
Const FundTransaction variables

events.body:
@meshcollider thanks, I couldn't figure out how many test issues there were in total. Please tag me in the PR for review

squashed
Is this "cleanup" a refactoring or a behaviour change?

Should be non behavior changing.
